Articles.Content: Long story short: turns out i could stand to learn more about rocket science. I've managed to get most places already but, after watching a few youtube videos that weren't just tutorials, it seems my vessels lacked....just lots. Also, great game.
Hi there Default and welcome to the forums! Perhaps you could show a few of your vessels in the Spacecraft Exchange forum and let people comment on them

Man, I wish I had that username!

Head of NASA: [barney runs off drunk and wastes his chance at being an astronaut] Well, Homer, I guess that makes you the winner by default...

Homer: Default? The two sweetest words in the English language! De-FAULT! De-FAULT! De-FAULT!

Welcome to the forums, if you need any help with designing missions, rockets, or just want to post about something cool you've done, here's the place to do it, it's a great community and we love to support new people!
